website_summaries.verdict: One of the long-standing hiking boots from Danner, the Mountain Light has earned a lot of compliments through the years. People generally appreciate its unrelenting comfort and classic styling. It's a worthy purchase because of its durability, versatility, quality, and recraftability.However, it still gained a couple of setbacks with its punishing break-in period and lack of cushioning. Everything considered the Danner Mountain Light is undoubtedly one of the sought-after boots for backpacking which is likely to please.
pros: The classic style of the Danner Mountain Light boots has received a commendation from the majority
According to those who have owned the boot for quite some time, it is indeed durable
The versatility of this pair is appreciated by a lot of brand loyalists
Professional gear bloggers are at a loss for words with the comfort delivered by the Danner Mountain Light boots
Some owners like the warmth it supplies during cold-weather hikes
Scores of verified purchasers love it for being recraftable
An abundance of hikers raves about the quality of the materials used in constructing this pair
The supportive build of this hiking boot is evident from the get-go, declares a seasoned backpacker
cons: The minority notes that the Mountain Light from Danner is a bit difficult to break-in
They attribute it to the awkward height of the cuff
An expert reviewer mentions that it lacks cushioning underfoot
He recommends using it with an aftermarket insole for more comfort

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. I really wanted to keep these because I like the look and the construction seems good. But for me they are way too narrow, even the 2EE. The toe box was very small and cramped my toes badly. while the heel section was loose. I went down a half size like recommended by Danner (I called them too). The Danner person suggested trying the version of this boot without Gor-tex which supposedly runs wider. I didnt do that so I'm not sure if this is true or not. I sent them back and got a pair of Merrell Wilderness. Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: bonedaddy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the bee's-knees! They look awesome, are super comfortable and are built to last forever. This is my 4th pair of Danner boots and I love them all. This pair is the best looking, for sure. I HIGHLY recommend sizing down at least 1/2 of a size from what you typically wear. I wear a size 12 in every shoe/boot I own, but I had the chance to try on a pair at a local Danner store before buying. My feet were swimming in a size 12. I ended up buying a size 11 EE and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots for a lifetime of use. They do run almost a size large....I wear size 10 ASICS running shoes, ordered a 9.5 in these and probably could have gone with a 9. Gonna stick with the 9.5 because I bought these for winter and will be wearing heavy socks. These are very well made in the USA boots, you wont be disappointed. Also need to note that they will require some breaking in for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old School Boots
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get back into hiking and backpacking after a thirty year layoff and just had to have my Danner lights again. I've tested it on several moderate routes and they've performed great. What I didn't anticipate is how heavy they are compared to my new model boots. Love them but you really don't need them anymore especially since their almost $400.
customer_reviews.author: James Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: DANNER IS THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say? These boots are the greatest. They are so comfortable, not too heavy and not too light. I chose to go my normal size US 9 and not size down as everyone and Danner website suggested. I put my full arch supoorts in the boots and are a perfect fit, either with a thin or thick sock. The craftsmanship is second to none and will last a very long time. Also want to say thankyou to Amazon for shipping these awesome boots to Australia👍. The only negative is that no one in Australia sells Danner, which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Nall

customer_reviews.title: Danner...'nough said!
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot, Perfect Quality! A little disappointed they didn't come with even the simplest of inserts, but not a show-stopper. Do yourself a favor and spend the $10 on Clear Danner Boot Dressing and it put on right out of the box...really brings out the beauty of the leather and eases your mind on protection. After conditioning, re-lacing and putting in inserts (from other boots) I immediately went on a 1hr urban walk over diverse terrain with my Dane. Zero hot spots, zero fatigue from the concrete, great grip (wet and hilly conditions), and no worry of street water stains. Highly recommended if looking for a high-end, great looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Nedo Family-PA

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Help, Great Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.text: Danner - Mountain Light, Fit Selector on Danner's Mobile site put me at size 11 when I listed Nike Free 11.5 as my running shoe, but size 10 when I listed Converse Chucks 10.5 as my casual. I tried both a 11 and a 10.5 Danner and the 10.5 fit perfect w/ enough room in the toe box. Two sets of red laces come with this boot (flat and round) as well as a Danner Select leather tag story book. Look of leather (pre and post leather conditioning) is classic and true to photos on Amazon. Fit is very comfortable so far (<1 month) and construction on the boot is exceptional. Look forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: ktmc

customer_reviews.title: Danner Mountain Light boots are amazing
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectation wear them every weekend. They look great with jeans going to dinner or working in the garden. Highly recommend them to anyone. Doc
customer_reviews.author: Ray Morales

customer_reviews.title: They were a bit stiff for the first 3 or 4 days but have broken in nicely. The only thing preventing me from giving them ...
customer_reviews.text: I figured I should wait a couple weeks before writing a review. These are a solid well built pair of boots. They were a bit stiff for the first 3 or 4 days but have broken in nicely. The only thing preventing me from giving them 5 stars is you will want to buy a set of danner insoles to go with them. Before that they were a bit uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time. The boots plus the insoles are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous leather
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny or should I say worth every one hundred dollar bill lol. They were my husband's favorite boots back in the day so I surprised him with a pair. The leather is definitely squeaky as you wear them in though so be patient
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Applegate

customer_reviews.title: All around good.
customer_reviews.text: I am on a back country trail crew and need something sturdy and reliable that I can wear all day for 8 days at a time without killing my feet. These are perfect.First tried them on with no added insole and found them surprisingly comfy right away. Decided to drop some Superfeet in and then they were tight and I had to break em in, but now that they're getting there they are wonderful. Waterproofing is solid, walked through tons of streams and spent almost a full 8 day hitch getting poured on (I work in a rainforest) they held up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! U get what u pay 4! U can see the quality & craftsmanship straight out of the box. I wear a size 10, but have wide feet. Ordered size 10ee & they fit like a glove! They feel like running shoes with support for the arch! When i wear these boots, I wear a thick sock & they fit perfect! No need 2 break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wanted a pair of these boots for years now!! We found them on Amazon and purchased them kind of wary about ordering shoes online. The boots fit perfect, and he absolutely loves them!! He says they are super comfortable too. We put some water proofing spray on them and that seems to work fine in case he gets caught out in the rain it won't mess up the boots, because they're not cheap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Weigart

customer_reviews.title: Danner Mountain Light Cascade
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair that my brother passed down to me many many years ago. I saw these and it brought me back. I am more than pleased, the comfort and the fit are amazing. Danner has been putting out quality products for a long time and these boots exceeded my expectations. I believe them to be a bit lighter than my first pair. I'm anxious to hit the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Pollard

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful "old school" boot
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful "old school" boot. Lacking positive arch support, I insert my "Good Feet" arch supports. Broke in in just a few days with application of Obenaufs LP twice. Looking forward to many comfy miles th these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Bumpgate Bob

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Classic Boots
customer_reviews.text: They are just as expected. Beautifully made. But these are an older classic style, very heavy. It doesn't bother me because I wanted these in addition to a lighter weight modern pair of hiking boots I own. It's almost impossible to find this kind of boot new. The only kinds of boots like these are previously used boots on e-bay. Be sure to order a half-size smaller as they recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: they're breaking in really nicely and are not nearly as heavy as I feared
customer_reviews.text: These books rock! When I initially opened the box, my size 13 boots looked huge and felt heavy. But, after wearing them for a week, they're breaking in really nicely and are not nearly as heavy as I feared. For me, they definitely seem to fit better/more comfortably when I'm wearing thick hiking or wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sweigart

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great product, albeit expensive. IMHO, the quality standard is very high here. It's evident in all the details such as the feel and look of leather. Off the board, these boots were very comfortable, even after walking 5+ miles.
customer_reviews.author: harold a pramekamol

customer_reviews.title: RUN LARGE
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, made in the USA boots. They run large. Definitely buy a half size smaller. I don't hike often and if I did I would get something more modern. I did get these on sale and would be hesitant to pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: Clark G

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect have a hundred miles on them I'll never buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect have a hundred miles on them I'll never buy another EURO brand. THESE boots can be resoled also..
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Finally got them!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at these boots a long time and finally got them! Would have given a 5 Star but fat laces were messed up. They don’t come with a foot bed so you’ll need to get a set. The are much darker after using danner’s water proofing paste. I work in rock dust (gravel) 12+ hours a day so we will see how well they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: JM1LL

customer_reviews.title: Wow! The Best Hiking Boot ON the Market today!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Danner makes the best hiking boot I've ever had. This is my third set in 40 years! If you need better you had better invent it because I've not run across any that even compare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I ordered them from a different place originally but need to exchange them for a bigger size but after a month the other place still didn’t have the size I needed in stock. I am a size 12 and I ordered a size 12 because for me the toe box was a bit tight in 11.5 like danner recommended. The boots now fit great and the price wasn’t too bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpacking boot for my feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Danner Mountain Lights, the first being purchase back in 1980. Best boots I ever had and well worth the money, even though the price is triple what they were back then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to boot
customer_reviews.text: Favorite boots. As with most boots, it’s probably in your best bet to size down a size. I’m a 14 in most sneakers. In these, I needed a 13. And even they are still a little roomy, but perfect for those days you need a thicker pair of socks
customer_reviews.author: LiamSharpe

customer_reviews.title: My dream boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very light, which is great. I have wanted boots like this for 35 years! They are expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: david meausky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and comfortable boots that are well made and light. Love them! They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I was told buying the 11.5 wide is no different than the 11.5 D, because how their made!! I’ve been with DANNER since 1990.. when I was a Marine. This is the first boot that has dissatisfied me!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boffo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Trail
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these boots for a long time. Im glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hauck

customer_reviews.title: I got a good fit. Right toe box has noticeably less volume ...
customer_reviews.text: I took Danners suggestion and went down a half size. I got a good fit. Right toe box has noticeably less volume than the left boot, however this did mot compromise the fit.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK CONNELLY

customer_reviews.title: A Little larger!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the boot, but runs a little larger than what size specifies!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, order normal size.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, as recommended ordered 1/2 size smaller but were a touch to small. Called Danner and they swapped out for a next size up. Fantastic boots, fantastic service.
customer_reviews.author: 10ecTiny

customer_reviews.title: but the shoes are beautiful and they feel good anywhere they aren't trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half a size down as directed and they fit well. I'm still in the break in period, so it's rough, but the shoes are beautiful and they feel good anywhere they aren't trying to rip my skin off.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Garbiso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Tanner boots have the best quality and the craftsmanship is unparalleled thanks Danner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond..
customer_reviews.text: Well above and beyond my expectations, very happy with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boot is great, however, the eye lits are too far apart. Makes it look funny.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Reed

customer_reviews.title: You need a pair of these.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! Good looking, comfortable, and excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lee Faulkenberry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Danners remind me of the 80’s old school boot. Already had several people comment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great boot. Size runs large, as claimed by Danner :)
customer_reviews.text: The boot is of excellent quality and is comfortable and functional. I'm normally just snug in a 10 EE, but there's maybe a drop too much room in this 10 EE boot. To be fair, they did advise ordering a half size down, and with my thicker hiking socks it's not a problem. Do consider the half size down advice.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: My fourth pair of Danner Boots. I read the reviews and ordered a 1/2 size smaller. Mountain Lights are my favorite boots. They are built last. I applied Clear Danner Boot Dressing the night before I wore them to break them in. I had a similar type of boot 25 years ago. Really happy with my Mtn Light Cascade Clovis so far. I buy Made in USA products whenever possible. I plan on visiting portland this Fall and will be going to their store to try out some new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dean K.

customer_reviews.title: These boots will take some time to break in. ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots will take some time to break in. Also, I noticed that when I got these boots, I did not receive the orthotic inserts, which is kind strange. Now if I want them, I have to pay separately to get them?
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

product_meta.title: Danner Men's Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Our bootmakers don't brag. They let their creations do the talking. With solid stitch down construction, vibram outsoles, and full-leather support, this classic boot could tell some stories
feature_bullets: Full grain, one-piece, all leather upper offers a classic look with superior waterproof protection
Vibram Kletterlift Outsole which is specifically designed for comfort and durability , the heel provides superb shock absorption
Wider platform for increased stability underfoot. Features two lace option and gore-tex liner
